de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui

Class RadioHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.RadioHelper

  • public class RadioHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements functionality for radio buttons.

    The access to simple functions is implemented with static access.

    Since:
    2
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    sebastian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RadioHelper()
      Class constructor without parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getSelectedBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] control)
      Returns the number of a selected radio button from a given control group.
      static void selectBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] control, int number)
      Enables one radio button and disable all the others in the given control group.
      static void toggleBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] master, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] slave)
      Toggles radio buttons vice versa on two given control groups.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadioHelper

        public RadioHelper()
        Class constructor without parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • getSelectedBtn

        public static int getSelectedBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] control)
        Returns the number of a selected radio button from a given control group.

        Pay attention to the fact, that the first button in the field has the number '0'.

        Parameters:
        control - Control[] object with radio buttons
        Returns:
        number of the selected radio button

      • selectBtn

        public static void selectBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] control,
                             int number)
        Enables one radio button and disable all the others in the given control group.
        Parameters:
        control - Control with radio buttons
        number - Button to enable

      • toggleBtn

        public static void toggleBtn(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] master,
                             org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] slave)
        Toggles radio buttons vice versa on two given control groups.

        With this helper the slave button will be toggled to a different index.

        Parameters:
        master - Radio button group which is selected
        slave - Radio button group which has to be toggled
